rule.name: RedundantAutowired
rule.message: For a spring bean with a single constructor, @Autowired can be omitted.
rule.description: Starting with Spring 4.3, if a class, which is configured as a Spring bean, has only one constructor, the @Autowired annotation can be omitted and Spring will use that constructor and inject all necessary dependencies. @Component marks a class as a spring bean, and @Repository, @Service, @Controller are all specializations of @Component. @RestController is a convenience annotation that includes @Controller.
